description: Download album posts from Afdian in text format

authToken.label: Auth Token / Cookie
authToken.tooltip:
How to get token:
1. Visit https://ifdian.net or https://afdian.com
2. Right click and select Inspect (DevTools) or press F12
3. Find Application -> Cookies -> auth_token
